songs.title: Intro
songs.lyrics:
[Scratched, repeated throughout]
Yo Professor, what's up?

Mad crimes in the air
And everybody talkin' like they don't care
Everybody wanna rhyme
But I'mma settle fakes 'cause it's about that time
I got the game in a smash
Whoever disagree is taken out like trash
It's my solo debut
Take it as present from me to you
Some odd seconds and countin'
Till I set things off and climb this mountain
